subject: Basketball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Cavaliers have offered LeBron James a contract extension, but he said Friday that “it would make no sense for me” to agree to one until after he becomes a free agent next summer.
snippet: The Cavaliers have offered LeBron James a contract extension, but he said Friday that “it would make no sense for me” to agree to one until after he becomes a free agent next summer.
